Function Documentation

virtual int CALICE::Mapper::getTrueCellID ( const int  virtualCellIndex  )  const [pure virtual, inherited]

return identifying index of cell

Cells of different size span different areas in Mokka CellID space. This functions returns for all coordinates of the cell the Mokka CellID which is used to uniquely identify it.

Parameters:
[in] virtualCellIndex (Mokka) cellID of (virtual) cell
Returns:
index of full cell
Exceptions:
BadDataException if cell does not exist

Implemented in CALICE::Ahc2Mapper, and CALICE::AhcMapper.
